law.text:
Trust fund moneys shall be distributed for the following purposes:
To provide services to individuals suffering from conditions that qualify for assistance from the fund, in accordance with criteria established by the board in KRS 211.474;
To establish and maintain a state medical registry for traumatic brain and spinal cord injuries; and
To meet the obligations incurred by the board in meeting its duties in accordance with the provisions of KRS 211.472 and 211.474.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 124, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1998.
